bill.title: Medicaid; direct the division to establish a medical home program.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 43-13-117, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Direct The Division Of Medicaid To Establish A Medicaid Medical Home Program; To Require The Division To Restructure Its Payment System To Support Primary Care Providers That Participate In A Medical Home Model; To Require The Division To Develop A System To Support Primary Care Providers In Developing A Program Organizational Structure Necessary To Provide A Medical Home; To Require The Division To Provide For The Development Of A Network Of Primary Care Providers For Participation In The Program That Provide Care To Their Patients Using The Medical Home Model; And For Related Purposes.
